<p class="has-skylith-white-color has-text-color">Whether you’re already into music and recording or looking to start from scratch, in under a year, CRAS provides the education and industry connections needed to succeed.</p>

<h2 class="wp-block-heading display-3 has-skylith-black-color has-text-color" id="music-production-school"><strong>CRAS Grads Make it</strong></h2>



<p class="has-skylith-black-color has-text-color">From pop, country and hip hop to heavy metal and EDM music, to movies, video games and live sound, CRAS grads have worked on numerous film, TV, and documentary projects, hundreds of AAA video game titles, and played a role in creating many Grammy-nominated and award-winning recordings. <strong>Attend CRAS and you could be part of the next generation of  professionals in the music and recording industries.</strong></p>

<p class="ghostkit-custom-SxXe1 has-skylith-black-color has-text-color"><em>“I have had the opportunity to lecture at CRAS a number of times and never cease to be impressed by both the staff and students. It’s a highly technical environment and the facilities are chock full of wonderful, state-of-the-art gear, sure, but the thing that impresses me most is the “family” feel among the staff and students and the level of technical chops and professionalism among the staff. In my book, the über-experienced CRAS staff members are rockstars in the tech-ed world and do a wonderful job of preparing students for their ultimate careers. Be it worship sound, concerts, recording, broadcast, education, film sound, game sound or any other aspect of professional audio and production, the field is wide open to those who possess a solid work ethic, act with integrity, are problem-solvers and put their employers’ needs above their own. Clearly it takes more than technical prowess to rise to the top, but I am confident that if students will keep their eyes & ears open, apply themselves and take advantage of all the opportunities CRAS presents, CRAS can help students craft the solid foundation on which to build successful careers. I wholeheartedly recommend CRAS.”</em></p>

<script>
gform.initializeOnLoaded( function() {jQuery(document).trigger("gform_pre_post_render", [{ formId: "1", currentPage: "1", abort: function() { this.preventDefault(); } }]);                if (event && event.defaultPrevented) {                return;         }        const gformWrapperDiv = document.getElementById( "gform_wrapper_1" );        if ( gformWrapperDiv ) {            const visibilitySpan = document.createElement( "span" );            visibilitySpan.id = "gform_visibility_test_1";            gformWrapperDiv.insertAdjacentElement( "afterend", visibilitySpan );        }        const visibilityTestDiv = document.getElementById( "gform_visibility_test_1" );        let postRenderFired = false;                function triggerPostRender() {            if ( postRenderFired ) {                return;            }            postRenderFired = true;            gform.core.triggerPostRenderEvents( 1, 1 );            if ( visibilityTestDiv ) {                visibilityTestDiv.parentNode.removeChild( visibilityTestDiv );            }        }        function debounce( func, wait, immediate ) {            var timeout;            return function() {                var context = this, args = arguments;                var later = function() {                    timeout = null;                    if ( !immediate ) func.apply( context, args );                };                var callNow = immediate && !timeout;                clearTimeout( timeout );                timeout = setTimeout( later, wait );                if ( callNow ) func.apply( context, args );            };        }        const debouncedTriggerPostRender = debounce( function() {            triggerPostRender();        }, 200 );        if ( visibilityTestDiv && visibilityTestDiv.offsetParent === null ) {            const observer = new MutationObserver( ( mutations ) => {                mutations.forEach( ( mutation ) => {                    if ( mutation.type === 'attributes' && visibilityTestDiv.offsetParent !== null ) {                        debouncedTriggerPostRender();                        observer.disconnect();                    }                });            });            observer.observe( document.body, {                attributes: true,                childList: false,                subtree: true,                attributeFilter: [ 'style', 'class' ],            });        } else {            triggerPostRender();        }    } );
</script>

<script>
    
    jQuery(document).ready(function(){
       
       let queryString = window.location.search;
       let queryParams = new URLSearchParams(queryString);
       
       if(queryParams.has('utm_source')){
           Cookies.set("utm_source", queryParams.get('utm_source'), { expires: 30 });
       }
        if(queryParams.has('utm_campaign')){
           Cookies.set("utm_campaign", queryParams.get('utm_campaign'), { expires: 30 });
        }
        if(queryParams.has('utm_term')){
           Cookies.set("utm_term", queryParams.get('utm_term'), { expires: 30 });
        }
        if(queryParams.has('mid')){
           Cookies.set("mid", queryParams.get('mid'), { expires: 30 });
        }  
        
       let $frames = jQuery("iframe[src*='https://form1.campuslogin.com/']");
              
       
       let utm_source = Cookies.get("utm_source");
       let utm_campaign = Cookies.get("utm_campaign");
       let utm_term = Cookies.get("utm_term");
       
       let mediaid = Cookies.get("utm_term");
       let media_extention = '';

       // if(utm_source === "google"){
       //   mediaid = '4157';
       // }
       // 
       // if (utm_source === "facebook"){
       //   mediaid = '4158';
       // }
       // 
       // if (utm_source === "bing"){
       //   mediaid = '4159';
       // }
       
        switch (utm_source) {
            case "google":
                mediaid = '4157';
                break;
            case "facebook":
                mediaid = '4158';
                break;
            case "bing":
                mediaid = '4159';
                break;
            // default:
            //     mediaid = '4414';
        }
       
       if(mediaid){
           media_extention = '&mediaid='+mediaid+'&showmedia=n';
           jQuery("#input_1_9").val(mediaid);
        }
       let utm_extention = '';
       if(utm_source){
           utm_extention += '&utm_source='+utm_source;
           jQuery("#input_1_10").val(utm_source);
        }
        if(utm_campaign){
           utm_extention += '&utm_campaign='+utm_campaign;
           jQuery("#input_1_11").val(utm_campaign);
        }
        if(utm_term){
           utm_extention += '&utm_term='+utm_term;
           jQuery("#input_1_12").val(utm_term);
        }
       
       console.log($frames);
       console.log(utm_extention);
       console.log(media_extention);
       
       $frames.each(function(){
           
           let $this = jQuery(this);
           let src = $this.attr('src');
           src += utm_extention+media_extention;
           $this.attr('src', src);
           
       });
       
    });
    
    var campusLoginSubmit = function(message){
        gtag("event", "campuslogin_form_submit", {
            form_name: message
        });
        console.log("submitted");
    };
    
    if (window.addEventListener) {
        window.addEventListener("message", onMessage, false);        
    } 
    else if (window.attachEvent) {
        window.attachEvent("onmessage", onMessage, false);
    }
    
    function onMessage(event) {
        // Check sender origin to be trusted
        const originURL = new URL(event.origin);
        console.log("Message Received" + originURL.hostname.includes("campuslogin.com"));
        if (!originURL.hostname.includes("campuslogin.com")) return;
    
        var data = event.data;
    
        if (typeof(window[data.func]) == "function") {
                        window[data.func].call(null, data.message);
                        console.log("message recieved");
        }
    }
    
    
</script>
